weka.distributed.spark

Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.distributed.spark.Dataset

  • public class Dataset
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that encapsulates dataset information - i.e. an RDD[Instance] along with ARFF header + summary attribute information
    Version:
    $Revision: 11605 $
    Author:
